TITLE: UBS net profit drops 52% in the first quarter due to hit from U.S. legal battle
SUMMARY: UBS reported $1.03 billion in net profit for the first quarter, down 52% year-on-year amid a legacy litigation matter.

TITLE: First Republic says deposits tumbled 40% to $104.5 billion in 1Q, but have stabilized since
SUMMARY: The deposit flight for the regional bank was worse than Wall Street expected.

TITLE: Microsoft reports earnings beat, says A.I. will drive revenue growth
SUMMARY: Microsoft's Azure cloud revenue topped analysts' estimates, and the company indicated it would keep investing in artificial intelligence.

TITLE: Alphabet reports revenue and earnings beat for first quarter
SUMMARY: In beating estimates, Google broke a string of four straight quarters in which it fell shy of analysts' expectations.

TITLE: Chipotle Mexican Grill's restaurant traffic grows as the chain proves its pricing power
SUMMARY: Shares of Chipotle jumped after the company's earnings and revenue beat Wall Street's expectations.

TITLE: Illumina unveils plans to cut costs as it faces shrinking margins
SUMMARY: The plans aim to reduce Illumina's annualized run rate expenses by more than $100 million starting later this year.

TITLE: UPS shares fall after delivery giant reports disappointing earnings
SUMMARY: UPS reported first-quarter misses on both earnings and revenue amid contentious contract negotiations and deceleration in U.S. sales.

TITLE: JetBlue posts quarterly loss but forecasts profit thanks to strong travel demand
SUMMARY: JetBlue posted a loss for the first three months of the year but forecast a profit for the second quarter thanks to strong travel demand.

TITLE: UBS profits hit by legacy legal costs as it nears Credit Suisse merger
SUMMARY: UBS reported $1.03 billion in net profit for the first quarter, down 52% year-on-year amid a legacy litigation matter.

TITLE: Boeing plans to boost 737 Max production to 38 planes per month despite manufacturing snag
SUMMARY: Boeing said Wednesday it will increase output of 737 Max planes to 38 a month later this year, up from 31 a month.

TITLE: SK Hynix, one of the biggest memory chipmakers, reports record quarterly loss as prices slump
SUMMARY: South Korean chipmaker SK Hynix has reported a record operating loss of 3.4 trillion won, but expects a rebound in the second half of the year.

TITLE: Meta shares pop 12% after company reports first sales increase in four quarters, issues optimistic guidance
SUMMARY: Facebook parent Meta reported revenue for the first quarter that topped estimates and issued a forecast for the second quarter that also exceeded expectations.

TITLE: Amazon set to report first-quarter earnings after the bell
SUMMARY: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy has been aggressively slashing costs through layoffs, a corporate hiring freeze and by ending some experimental projects.

TITLE: Eli Lilly misses on earnings but raises full-year guidance
SUMMARY: The company reported adjusted earnings of $1.62, which missed analyst expectations of $1.73 for the quarter.

TITLE: American Airlines ekes out a first-quarter profit as carrier ramps up flying
SUMMARY: For the second quarter of the year, American Airlines forecast adjusted per-share earnings at the high end of analysts' expectations.

TITLE: Comcast beats estimates despite slowing broadband growth, higher Peacock losses
SUMMARY: Comcast topped analyst expectations, despite a tough comparison to last year, when NBC aired both the Super Bowl and Beijing Olympics during the first quarter.

TITLE: Merck results beat expectations despite a big drop in sales of Covid antiviral treatment
SUMMARY: Despite the drop in molnupiravir sales, Merck's revenue and adjusted earnings for the first quarter beat Wall Street's expectations.

TITLE: Deutsche Bank logs 11th straight quarterly profit, reveals job cuts
SUMMARY: Deutsche Bank on Thursday reported a net profit of 1.158 billion euros ($1.28 billion) for the first quarter.

TITLE: Barclays posts 27% rise in net profit for the first quarter, beats expectations
SUMMARY: London-based bank Barclays reported first quarter results ahead of consensus on Thursday, with income boosted by higher rates and credit cards.

TITLE: Samsung's profit plunged 95% to its lowest level since 2009 as chip demand slumps
SUMMARY: Samsung's profit plunged in the first quarter of 2023 as prices for memory chips continued to fall and demand remained weak.

TITLE: Norfolk Southern reports $387 million charge for the first quarter after East Palestine derailment
SUMMARY: The charge resulted in a year-over-year decline in first-quarter profits, the rail company said.

TITLE: Amazon stock dips as uncertain cloud outlook overshadows revenue beat
SUMMARY: Amazon reported first-quarter sales on Thursday that beat analysts' estimates.

TITLE: Intel reports largest quarterly loss in company history
SUMMARY: The loss per share was slightly better than soft Wall Street expectations.

TITLE: Snap plunges on first-quarter revenue miss
SUMMARY: Snap continues to suffer in a tough digital ad market with its first-quarter sales missing analyst projections.

TITLE: Sony posts record annual profit boosted by chips and all-time high PlayStation 5 sales
SUMMARY: Sony said it sold 19.1 million PlayStation 5 units in its fiscal year, beating its own forecast of 18 million units.

TITLE: Cloudflare stock plunges more than 20% after revising guidance down
SUMMARY: The company issued muted guidance for the full-year and upcoming quarters that sent shares down, despite posting a beat on the bottom line.

TITLE: Hasbro, Mattel shares rise as toymakers announce multiyear licensing agreement, increased IP focus
SUMMARY: Hasbro, Mattel and other toy stocks rallied on Thursday after mixed earnings reports from the two rival toymakers.

TITLE: Ford posts stellar first quarter, boosted by fleet and legacy truck divisions
SUMMARY: Ford is reporting its quarterly financial results by business unit, instead of by region, for the first time.

TITLE: Starbucks earnings beat as China reverses same-store sales declines
SUMMARY: Starbucks said its same-store sales climbed 11% in its fiscal second quarter.

TITLE: AMD revenue drops 9% as PC chip sales decline sharply
SUMMARY: AMD's report comes as the PC industry is in a deep slump, with shipments dropping 30% in the first quarter, according to IDC.

TITLE: Uber revenue beats expectations and the stock is up
SUMMARY: Uber reported first-quarter results Tuesday that beat analysts' expectations for revenue.

TITLE: Pfizer earnings and revenue top expectations despite Covid vaccine sales decline
SUMMARY: Pfizer's quarterly earnings topped analysts' expectations, despite a sales decline driven by the lower demand for the company's Covid vaccine.

TITLE: Restaurant Brands earnings beats estimates, fueled by Tim Hortons' and Burger King's strong sales
SUMMARY: Burger King's U.S. same-store sales climbed 8.7%, an early sign that its turnaround is taking hold.
